post.description: OpenAI-compatible Chat Completions. Use Bearer authorization. When stream=true, responds as Server-Sent Events (SSE); otherwise returns JSON.

message.content: BTC is trading flat in the last 24h with rising open interest.

sse.description: Rendered in the doc tab to illustrate stream=true output.

post.description: OpenAI-compatible Chat Completions. Use Bearer authorization. When stream=true, responds as Server-Sent Events (SSE); otherwise returns JSON.

get.description:
The AI Asset Recommendation API provides a data-driven ranking and evaluation of crypto assets listed in the Bithumb KRW market, combining real-time market data with multi-dimensional scoring and AI-generated interpretation.
The API consists of two core components:
1. AI Recommendation List
Delivers a ranked list of eligible assets based on a composite Total Score (0–10), calculated as the rounded average of five individual category scores.
2. AI Recommendation Details
Provides an in-depth evaluation for a selected asset, including real-time price information, overall recommendation summary, detailed score interpretation, category breakdowns, price change visualization, and social sentiment distribution.
If certain data is unavailable or not applicable, corresponding fields will return null or be omitted.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Prompt type (template key)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Tickers (comma separated, required. support BTC,ETH,SOL. e.g BTC,ETH)
parameters.name: tickers

200.description: Returns AI recommended assets on success

get.description:
The AI Recommended Prompts API generates context-aware analytical questions and structured responses for the Bithumb KRW crypto market, helping users quickly understand current market conditions, asset movements, capital flows, and emerging narratives.
The API covers both fixed core questions (e.g. market sentiment, strongest momentum assets, trending issues) and dynamically selected questions from a predefined pool, which may change over time. Each prompt produces a structured output consisting of a concise summary, detailed analysis, and a neutral conclusion.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Prompt type (template key)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Ticker (required when type is go_up or go_down)
parameters.name: ticker

200.description: Returns AI recommended prompt on success

get.description:
AI Report API generates a structured research report for crypto assets, combining real-time market snapshots, trend summaries, technical analysis, sector-optimized on-chain metrics, and community sentiment insights.
The report is generated as a point-in-time snapshot and is designed to be beginner-friendly and neutral, presenting both bullish and bearish factors without providing financial advice.
On-chain indicators are dynamically selected based on the asset’s sector classification using a three-layer metric framework (common, shared, and sector-specific).
If certain data is unavailable or not applicable, corresponding fields will return null or be omitted.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Report type (template key)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Ticker (required)
parameters.name: ticker

get.description:
Returns drop token news list for a given date (optional).
Data is fetched from `bithumb_reports` by signal_type = drop_token_news and the latest batch_sequence.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

get.description:
Returns major events list for a given date (optional).
Data is fetched from `bithumb_reports` by signal_type = major_event_tonight (fallback: major_events_tonight) and the latest batch_sequence.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

get.description:
Render as a digest
Display the list as a daily macro/market digest and link out to the original sources when available.
Must-know macro/market news list for a given date (optional).

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

get.description:
The Market Report API provides a consolidated daily overview of the crypto market, combining market sentiment indicators, trend analysis, sector insights, news highlights, and asset performance into a single structured response.
The API evaluates overall market direction (Up / Flat / Down) using internal logic and sentiment indicators such as the Fear & Greed Index and the number of rising assets compared to the previous day. It also surfaces key market trends, trending sectors, and must-know news, including AI-highlighted headlines and major upcoming events.
Additionally, the API delivers asset-level insights such as top gainers and losers versus the previous day, along with optional notification prompts for market alerts. All outputs are generated as a point-in-time snapshot and are intended for informational purposes only, without providing investment advice.
If specific data points are unavailable, the corresponding fields will return null or be omitted.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Report type (template key)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Returns rise token news list for a given date (optional).

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

get.description:
Returns market sentiment snapshot.
Data is fetched from `bithumb_reports` by signal_type = market_sentiment and the latest batch_sequence (optionally filtered by date).

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

get.description: provide a comprehensive list and analysis of all major events that may impact the crypto market, with a special focus on macroeconomic and market-specific factors affecting the Korean (KR) crypto market.

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If date is not provided, returns the most recent data
parameters.name: date

finish_reason.description:
Indicates why the model stopped generating. Common values:
- stop — normal completion
- length — hit max token limit
- tool_calls — model invoked a tool
- content_filter — blocked by safety filters
- error — unexpected interruption

content.example: Here is a summary of today's Bitcoin market...

reasoning.description: A field to showcase model's thinking process.

created.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was generated.

id.description: A unique identifier for the generated message. Used for internal tracking.

content.description: The final user-visible text generated by the assistant.

role.description:
The role of the message. The source of the message. Include:
- system — system instructions
- user — user input
- assistant — model output
- tool — tool responses

credit.description: Credit 当前可用额度（余额）

usage.description: Usage 累计使用额度（累计消费）

description.example: Calculate the total value of a crypto portfolio

parameters.description: Parameters is a JSON Schema object.
